cards.title: Mortgage Loan Agreement
prompts: Summarize this contract in simple, layman terms for a non-lawyer audience in a few lines.
As a homeowner, explain and summarize the contract to me in simple terms.
As an investor explain and summarize this contract to me in simple terms.

List all the loan servicing company protections that appear in this agreement.

cards.title: NYC Taxi Data
prompts: Show revenue loss analysis for yellow taxis - how much money did they lose to ride-sharing.
Show driver utilization patterns - avg hours per day per driver trends.
